text: Hianagi Ra Anumzamo'na menina rama'a ha' vahe huzamantesuge'za e'za, nozame zama nehaza vahe'mo'zama kuko atre'za nozamema aze'nerizaza hu'za, ama ana vahera ha' vahe'mo'za zamazerigahaze. Ana'ma hutesage'na ete henka mago'ene ha' vahera huzamantesuge'za e'za, zagagafa zama nehaza vahe'mo'zama zaga kfama zamarotago hu'za nehazaza hu'za, ranra agonaramimpine, ne'onse agonaramimpine, havegampinema fra'ma ki'za mani'nafintira zamavazu hugahaze.
